title: Dual Sim dual standby for pixel 3XL updated to Android 11
content:
I just discovered that I can add an esim to my pixel 3XL, updated to Android 11.

Does support for dual Sim dual standby DSDS have been added for pixel 3XL? 

From a search in the help center, Google mention DSDS for pixel 3a and forward, but the interface to add a second Sim seems to be the same on my pixel 3XL. 

So this functionality has been added with newer update? 

I am checking before committing to purchase an esim
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
